In England, in the seven days to 30 March, there were 445,995 new confirmed cases (788.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 March, there were 500,317 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 11% (54,322 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 April is 17,986,241 (31,805.8 cases per 100,000 population).
